body:
like "Nemesis Trap","Arrow Volley Trap",...
their type is "Instant - Trap".
author: [neoedmund](https://code.google.com/u/neoedmund/)
title: sub-type Trap not implemented

comments.body:
similar sub types are:
"Trap"
"Assembly-Worker"
"Donkey" 
"Pig"
"Arcane"
"Townsfolk"  
"Locus"
"Gamer"  
"Lair"
"Curse"
...and many others.

maybe just use a "etc" type for some sub-type or type not known.
comments.author: [neoedmund](https://code.google.com/u/neoedmund/)

comments.body:
Thanks, we haven't been keeping up with the rules updates. Revision c1558fe63e14 added in all the subtypes listed in the 1st Feb 2012 comprehensive rules.

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
